welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bay, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our picturesque beaches, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal dedicated to Philippine Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small terminal used by low-cost carriers for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 1 hour per device, with option to extend for a fee.
